p: The mechanical robustness testing indicated that the film retains superhydrophobicity after 5 cycles (1 m) after abrasion test. Meanwhile, the film also demonstrated excellent performance in self-cleaning testing. The procedure we have described ensures that the transparent superhydrophobic coating results from alkoxysilane via AACVD. The possibility to deposit such films would increase again the potential of this technique and provides a new potential route for the preparation of higher transparent silica superhydrophobic coating in large –scale applications.
